price: ߏ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߠߋ߬ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߝߍ߬ߙߍ ߕߍ߫ ߝߏߦߌ߫ ߢߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫، ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߘߍ߬ߡߍ߲߬ ߠߊ߫
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُمۡ كَيۡدُهُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yugh'nī ʿanhum kayduhum shayan walā hum yunṣarūna
